item.content:encoded:
Our Wish | Christmas Letter & 6 Photo Collage Holiday Card

Hot Review! Our Wish | Christmas Letter & 6 Photo Collage Holiday Card – Christmas Cards This item is trending! Our Wish good product Christmas Letter & 6 Photo Collage Holiday Card It’s in stock and ready to ship.A modern and boho Christmas holiday card, a canvas to showcase your year’s most cherished moments. This design features a photo collage of six of your favorite photos arranged around the card’s edge. In the middle of the card, "happiest holidays", or a greeting of your choice is printed in terracotta script calligraphy. Below, your family name is presented in classic serif typography, with the year in italics. A sweet little heart in the same color as the lettering marks the end of the text. As you turn the card over, you will see a template Christmas letter against the warm terracotta color. Edit the custom message area with holiday wishes, or transform it into a ‘year in review’ style family newsletter to share your updates from the past year. The message is signed with your family name in the same elegant script font. We have used "Our wish for you" as the placeholder title, followed by warm wishes for the upcoming year. Between the title and the message, there is the same cute heart from the front. All fonts and colors are editable. Ideal for those who approach holiday mail with a personal and heartfelt touch. Ideal for showcasing a variety of photos, from family gatherings to travel adventures, it’s a wonderful way to encapsulate ‘what a year’ it has been. Share your treasured memories and family news with style and warmth this holiday season. Matching items are available in the collection linked on this page. Feel free to message me through the button below with any questions. Browse our store for more multi-photo Christmas holiday cards. Price:$1.83
